Producer: Rhonda Byrne, Robert W. Cort, Joe Gelchion, Matthew George, Robert Katz
Production Co: Shine Box Media Group, Illumination Productions, TRI G, Covert Media, Savvy Media Holdings, Robert Cort Productions
Synopsis: Miranda Wells is a hardworking young widow who's struggling to raise three children on her own. A powerful storm soon brings a devastating challenge and a mysterious man, Bray Johnson, into her life. In just a few short days, Bray's presence reignites the family's spirit -- but he carries a secret that could change everything.
Title: The Secret: Dare to Dream
